1249.question: How much important is the visual grounding in the learning of the multilingual representations?

7-Table1-1.png: The visual grounding is important in the learning of multilingual representations, as it helps to improve the accuracy and performance of the model. The table shows the crosslingual semantic similarity scores across six subtasks for ImageVec and previous work, which indicates the effectiveness of the visual grounding in improving the multilingual representations. The scores are presented in a tabular format, with the last column indicating the combined score across all subtasks. The bolded scores indicate the best scores on

1249.answer: performance is significantly degraded without pixel data
